titles.title: REAL ID Modernization Act
REAL ID Modernization Act
REAL ID Modernization Act
REAL ID Modernization Act
REAL ID Modernization Act
A bill to modernize the REAL ID Act of 2005, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 116-303.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 601.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
